1: <pb/><t>Ate Qman Dyos k'ik'lel weye';</t> <t>ntzaj tq'o'n tkyaqilju' nnojqelan weye'.</t>
2: <t>Nchin ojlane' tu'n kyoj cha'x k'ul,</t> <t>ex nchinx tiq'i'ne' kytzi a' chab'a kyel,</t>
3: <t>ntzaj tq'o'ntl wipumale'</t> <t>ex nchinx tiq'ine' kyoj b'a'n b'e,</t> <t>te ninb'ilte tb'i.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Maskye machin nik'e' toj jun b'e xob'ajilx,</t> <t>lay chin xob'e',</t> <t>qu'n atiya wuk'i'le', Nman Dyos;</t> <t>q'uqli nk'u'je' kyi'ju' ttzeya.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Matxi' kub' tb'incha'na jun ninwan weye'</t> <t>kywitzku' wajq'oje;</t> <t>majaxtqo'na aseyt toj nwi'ye' naku'j nimaqxjal qine',</t> <t>ex matzaj tnojsa'na nb'ase' b'a'nxi'x.</t>
6: <t>Atiju' t-xtalb'ila ex tk'u'jlalila wuk'i'le',</t> <t>ex chin najale' toju' tjaya Nman Dyos</t> <t>toj tkyaqilju' nchwinqlale', chiju' b'itzal.</t>
